import { Col, Container, Row , Button, Dropdown, DropdownButton, Card, Table, Select} from "react-bootstrap"; import "../styles/home.css" import DataPlot from "./plots/plot" import { useState } from 'react' import { Bar, Line, Doughnut} from 'react-chartjs-2'; const Home = () => { const langs = [...new Set(Object.values(data1.language))] const [selected, setSelected] = useState('javascript') const x = [Object.values(data1.users), Object.values(data1.language)] const user_lang = [] x[1].forEach((itm, inx)=> { if(itm === selected){ user_lang.push(x[0][inx]) } }) const handleChange = (e)=> { setSelected(e.target.value); } const MONTHS = ['January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July']; const genLineData = (moreData = {}, moreData2 = {}) => { return { labels: MONTHS, datasets: [ { label: 'Dataset 1', backgroundColor: "#eb144c", borderColor: "#0693e3", borderWidth: 1, data: [3,7,1,8,9,3,4,6], ...moreData, }, { label: 'Dataset 2', backgroundColor: "#eb144c", borderColor: "#0693e3", borderWidth: 1, data: [7,1,0,4,6,2,78,1], ...moreData2, }, ], }; }; const genPieData = () => { return { datasets: [ { data: [56, 31, 11], backgroundColor: ['#33bb35', '#fcb900', '#b80000'], label: 'Challenges', }, ], labels: ['Easy', 'Medium', 'Hard'], }; }; return (
